full_summary:
### Tender for R-Mode Transmitter
#### Details

**Reference Number:** PW-QF-117-29139
**Solicitation Number:** F7048-230143
**Publication Date:** August 7, 2023
**Closing Date:** September 5, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Amendment Date:** August 30, 2023

#### Tender Description
The Government of Canada requires the procurement of R-Mode Transmitters for use by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) and the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG). The procurement is being conducted through a competitive bid process, and the contract award will be made to the responsive bidder with the lowest evaluated price.

### Requirements

* 3 R-Mode Transmitters
* Delivery to be completed on or before March 29, 2024
* Firm Unit Pricing for the equipment acquisition

### Contracting Entity

Public Works and Government Services Canada
7A2, Place du Portage, Phase III, 11 Laurier Street
Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

### Contact Information

Cindy Deck
cindy.deck@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(819) 420-4557

### Document Availability

The solicitation documents can be downloaded from the [Government Electronic Tendering Tool](https://buyandsell.gc.ca).

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is exempt from the WTO-AGP, CPTPP, and CETA.

Note: I’ve rewritten the above text, summarizing it and phrasing it in a more professional tone. The original document had a lot of extraneous information, so I have excluded it to make the text more concise and relevant to the procurement.
